section.name: Psychophysics
section.definition: Properties for describing an psychophysical experiment.

property.name: Task
property.definition: The task the subjects have to do like "discrimination" between different stimuli, "detection" of a stimulus etc...

property.name: Paradigm
property.definition: The experimental paradigm e.g. Two-alternative-forced-choice, Three-alternative-forced-choice.

property.name: TrainingTrials
property.definition: The number of trials used for training of the experimental subject.

property.name: SubjectInstruction
property.definition: The instructions given to the subjects.

property.name: definition
property.definition: A definition of the conducted experiment.
